LocationPicker.getLocationFailed: Enweghi ike inweta ọnọdụ, biko lelee ntọala ikike

LocationPicker.permissionPrompt: Anyị kwesịrị inweta ozi ọnọdụ gị iji nyekwuo ọrụ, enwere ike ịhapụ ya?
